divs: sighting detailspreforming my usual evening chores - taking care of my dogs. my father had just called and we began a conversation when my eye caught sight of an object that glowed a blue\white light which seamed to cause a halo around the object and also a v-shaped tail - no sound at all.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Keyser
There were no other sightings in Keyser on or around November 12th 2010
Summary: Object flew east to west covering a distance of approx. three miles in 5 sec
